{"id":649202131,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645879008,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/649202131/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"7.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        stack<char> st;\n        for (int i = 0;i<s.size();i++){\n            st.push(s[i]);\n            while (!st.empty() && ((st.top()==s[i+1]+32) || (st.top()==s[i+1]-32))){\n                st.pop();\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\t\tstring ret = \"\";\n        while(!st.empty()){\n            ret = st.top() + ret;\n            st.pop();\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
